divs: Sighting Details1. We were cooking out behind our house than suddenly it came out of nowhere. 2. We saw a ball of light with a long tail on it. 3. We noticed that it first appeared to be a comet until it stopped suddenly in the sky. 4. It appeared to stop in the sky and split up into 5 separate pod-like structures. The pods slowly moved away from the structure for what appeared to be five minutes than gently moved back towards the center structure. 5. I wondered if it was going to come and hit the ground within a 60 mile range of my house. 6. It disappeared behind the tree line.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Franklin
There were no other sightings in Franklin on or around July 13th 2013
Summary: This object appeared to be a comet but stopped and split into smaller pieces.
